I.ii.1.C.1.g
.
Pension-Related EP 330 Established by Automation
Hospital reports generated by automation are established as an EP 330.  The date of claim is the corresponding date of hospital admission.
All pension-related hospital adjustments established by automation will have an appropriate claim label corresponding to the specific hospital report and adjustment needed.  The table below describes the claim labels associated with each type of hospital report.
Type of Hospital Report
Claim Label
Special Report for aid and attendance (A&A)
PMC A&A Admission Report
, or
PMC A&A Discharge Report
Pension Report (admission/discharges)
PMC Improved Pension Admission Report
PMC Improved Pension Discharge Report
PMC Section 306 Pension Admission Report
, or
PMC Section 306 Pension Discharge Report
Re-Admission Report
PMC A&A Re-Admission Report
PMC A&A Re-Admission Discharge Report
PMC Improved Pension Re-Admission Report
PMC Improved Pension Re-Admission Discharge
PMC Section 306 Pension Re-Admission Report
, or
PMC Section 306 Pension Re-Admission Discharge
Contract Nursing Home (CNH) Report (admission/discharges)
PMC CNH Admission Report,
or
PMC CNH Discharge Report
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Pension Management Center (PMC) Procedures
citation: Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
